actions.name: Boom Box
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Sonic] Physical- and Special-Category Attacks gain [Crit 1] (or [Crit X+1]), and their [Sonic] Status-Category Attacks have +20 Accuracy, max 100.

system.description: Effect: The user's [Sonic] Physical- and Special-Category Attacks gain [Crit 1] (or [Crit X+1]), and their [Sonic] Status-Category Attacks have +20 Accuracy, max 100.
